description:
NimbusI18nProvider component that provides internationalization context for React Aria components.
This is a proxy component that wraps React Aria's I18nProvider.

locale.description:
BCP47 language code for internationalization (e.g., 'en-US', 'de-DE', 'es-ES')
This affects how dates, numbers, and other locale-specific content is formatted.
locale.name: locale

children.description: Child components to be wrapped with i18n context
children.name: children
